features: 【Safe Fast Charging】: APFEN iPhone charger cable are made of high purity copper core and smart intelligent chip with overcharge protection, stable current protection, automatic switching and battery protection .

【90 Degree Design】: 90 degree lightning cable provide carefree gaming experience, It is very convenient to charge the mobile phone when playing games and watching movies. The data cable will not press your hand, let you experience your comfortable feel, reduce the pressure on the finger, improve the sensitivity, avoids bending and breaking the data cable, and extends the service life.

【MFI Certified Lightning Cable】: Each cable contains an authorization chip issued to ensure 100% compatibility with iPhone.Built with terminal and smart chip. connector with a lightning end, ensured safe charging for your devices. Enjoy fast data transfer, syncing and charging.

【Perfect Compatibility】: Precise interface design, iPhone charger compatible with iPhone 13/iPhone 13 mini/iPhone 13 Pro/iPhone 13 Pro Max iPhone 12/iPhone 11 Pro/iPhone 11 Pro Max/XS / Max / XR / X / 8 Plus / 8 / 7 Plus / 7 / 6s Plus / 6s / 6 Plus / 6 / 5s / 5c / 5 / iPad Pro / iPad Air / Air 2 / iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 4 / iPad 4th gen / iPod Touch 5th gen / iPod.

【What You Get】3 pack (6FT Pink/Green/Purple) MFI Certified iPhone charging cables .this iPhone charger cable long enough to be convenient to charge your device in bedroom, sofa, office, travel，even when you are on the backseat of the car.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why You Need a APFEN 90 DEGREE iPhone Charger Cable ? Over time, the Original lightening cable is easy to bend and break at the joint. And the angle sometimes becomes awkward when you have to use the device and charge at the same time. iPhone Charger 90 Degree is a brilliant design for charging and using the device at the same time, or simply charging within limited space. It’s easier to hold, takes up less space on a desk or in the car, and keeps the cord out of the way. The reinforced joint is more difficult to bend, appears sturdy and lasting. The quality is excellent: the cord is flexible but substantial and the finish is completely smooth. The length is long enough for indoor use and the cable is tangle free.

APFEN iPhone charger cables--a reliable product you can trust: -APFEN has been specialized in manufacturing quality and affordable iPhone lightning cords for many years. -Friendly customer follow-up support, enjoy our iphone cable with confidence. Package Content: 1*6ft Nylon braided iPhone cable - Pink 1*6ft iPhone charging cable - Fruit Green 1*6ft iPhone lightning cable - Light Purple

Military Grade Material And Nylon Tangle-Free Design Strong Military Fiber, The Most Flexible, Powerful Material, Make Tensile Force Increased By 200%. Premium Nylon Braided Adds Additional Tangle Free With 10000+ Bend Lifespan. Perfect 6Ft - Enjoy Free Life. MFI Certified Lightning Cable Each cable contains an authorization chip issued to ensure 100% compatibility with iPhone. Built with terminal and smart chip. connector with a lightning end, ensured safe charging for your devices. Enjoy fast data transfer, syncing and charging. Safe Fast Charging iPhone charger cord are made of high purity copper core and smart intelligent chip with overcharge protection, stable current protection, automatic switching and battery protection .

90 degree lightning cable provide carefree gaming experience, It is very convenient to charge the mobile phone when playing games and watching movies. The data cable will not press your hand, let you experience your comfortable feel, reduce the pressure on the finger, improve the sensitivity, avoids bending and breaking the data cable, and extends the service life. 6FT super long iPhone Cable, wear-resistant and free of tangles, allowing you to charge freely in the bedroom, office or even the back seat of the car. Nylon Braided and extra length, you can use the cables for a very long time. Durable cover with the cable, even your cute cat and dog will not break them. Wide Compatibility iPhone Charger Cable Fast Charging & Data Transfer: iPhone 13, 13 Pro,13 Pro Max, 13 Mini, iPhone 12, 12 Mini, 12 Pro, 12 Pro Max, iPhone 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, XS Max, XS, XR, X, SE 2020 iPhone 8 Plus, 8, 7 Plus, 7, iPhone 6s, 6 , 6s Plus, 6 Plus, iPhone 5C, iPhone 5S, iPhone 5, iPad 9, iPad Mini 6 iPad Air / Air 2/ iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 3 iPod nano (7th generation), iPod touch (5th generation),ect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and fast charge!
reviews.reviewText: These are nice, durable chargers that have great length. They also charge my phone very quickly in comparison to other off-brand iPhone charges. The colors are super cute, true to what is advertised and the three pack is a great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great cord for kids so they don’t break.
reviews.reviewText: Good length , good quality , perfect for kids so they don’t snap the cord while using it when charging .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Those charges are amazing. I love the way how easy it to charge and how fasted the phone charge plus the long cord make easy to connect from anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these a while ago and the purple one was a dud. Needed more so I figured I would order the same one, thinking what are the chances of getting another dud? Well…the purple one in my new pack also doesn’t work. The other two are great and it’s hard to beat for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price!!
reviews.reviewText: 1. Great price! As a dog mom, I’m constantly going through chargers, so when I saw this bargain, I couldn’t resist buying it!2. Nicely packaged! Each of them separated & banded together, in 1 bag!3. All 3 of them worked! Naturally I had to try each of them to make sure.4. Love the design of the charger ends being sideways; I personally find it more comfortable to hold on my hand; and also works great with my phone stand.5. They also feel like a more durable product over the traditional ones.6. Last but not least, I personally love the colors of them!
